info.description: Backend API for New Pay salary estimation and peer review platform
info.title: New Pay API

get.description: Get a paginated list of all audit logs (admin only)

parameters.description: Sort by field (id, user_id, action, resource, created_at)
parameters.name: sort_by

post.description: Create a new criteria catalog (admin only)

put.description: Update a catalog (admin only, restricted in archived phase)

delete.description: Delete a catalog (admin only, only in draft phase)

post.description: Create a new category in a catalog (admin only)
Create a new path in a category (admin only)

get.description: Get all changes made to a catalog (admin only)

post.description: Create or update a description for a path-level combination (admin only)
Create a new level in a catalog (admin only)
Move catalog from draft to active phase (admin only)
Move catalog from active to archived phase (admin only)

get.description: Get a list of all available roles (admin only)
Retrieve all self-assessments with optional filters (admin only)

parameters.description: Filter by username (email, first name, or last name)
parameters.name: username

delete.description: Delete a closed self-assessment that was never submitted (admin only)

get.description: Get all active sessions for all users (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a specific session by session_id (admin only)
Delete all active sessions for a specific user (admin only)
delete.summary: Delete all sessions for a user

post.description: Assign a role to a user (admin only)
Admin endpoint to cancel all pending verification tokens for a user
Delete a user from the system (admin only)

get.description: Get any user's information by ID (admin only)
Get a paginated list of all users (admin only)

post.description: Remove a role from a user (admin only)
Admin endpoint to mark a user's email as unverified
Admin endpoint to send verification email to any user
Set a new password for any user (admin only)
Update a user's email, first name, and last name (admin only)
Toggle a user's active/inactive status (admin only)
Authenticate user and return JWT tokens
Clear refresh token cookie and invalidate session

get.description: Processes the OAuth callback and creates/logs in user
Redirects to the OAuth provider for authentication

post.description: Reset user password using token from email
Send password reset email to user

200.description: Reset email sent if user exists

post.description: Get a new access token using refresh token from cookie
Create a new user account with email verification

get.description: Verify user's email address using token from email
Get all catalogs based on user permissions

post.description: Create a new self-assessment for an active catalog

get.description: Get a specific catalog with all details
Get public app configuration (registration settings)
Get public OAuth configuration (all enabled providers)
Retrieve self-assessments based on user role (user: own, reviewer: submitted+, admin: metadata only)
Retrieve catalogs that users can create self-assessments for
Retrieve all self-assessments created by the current user
Retrieve a self-assessment by ID (with permission checks)
Retrieve the completion status and progress of a self-assessment
Retrieve all responses for a self-assessment

post.description: Save or update a response for a category in a self-assessment

delete.description: Delete a response for a category in a self-assessment

put.description: Transition a self-assessment to a new status
Submit a self-assessment for review (changes status from draft to submitted)

post.description: Change the authenticated user's password

400.description: Invalid request or password too short

get.description: Get authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Update authenticated user's profile information
Resend email verification link for current user if not yet verified

get.description: Get all active sessions for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a specific session by session_id
Delete all active sessions for the user except the current one
delete.summary: Delete all user sessions except current

path_level_description.description: The description of the path-level combination

status.description: draft, submitted, in_review, reviewed, discussion, archived, closed
draft, submitted, in_review, reviewed, discussion, archived, closed

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
